body:
How to get a wind rose for hours betwen  8:00 to 18:00? Im looking for nat vent potentials so I want to set differents analysis period just for occupied hours.

Thanks... this is an amazing tool

replies.body:
The answer is in your question: set the analysisPeriod input to whatever you want.

-A.

yes... after revieing the results I can say that works

tx s mocu Ab.
